"J. B. Rainsberger" wrote:

> Soon I expect I'll be back to normal and be able to think long and hard
> about each of your questions. Until then, I hope that others are able to
> pick up the slack.
>
> Hmm... now imagine if the top five question-answerers on this list are
> all going through roughly the same thing....
>
> I'm just asking everyone to remember to have respect for the volunteers
> who answer your questions on this list. I appreciate them all.
>

J.B.,

Rest.  There are lots of good folks lurking on this list that are able to pick up the slack.  If not, those asking the questions will find answers on their own and then become the answerers.
It's emergent.  When you've had ample time to recharge, I'm confident you'll be even more valuable to this list and your other endeavors.

Thanks for all the time and energy you've already contributed to this community.  I appreciate it.  More importantly, I hope it's been rewarding for you.

Best Regards,

Mike
